id: Little Library 1.0 - Reading Tracker Notion Template
name: Little Library 1.0 - Reading Tracker Notion Template
description: If you: set a reading challenge every year and only reach nearly half your goal, want to store books you pass by on the internet (your favorite influencer shared and you can’t miss them) and quickly put them into your reading list, easily take notes of the learning-worthy of each book and quickly put them into action. This template will help you: know your reading speed and reading process with the process bar and by tracking the amount of time you need to finish a book, encourage you by automat
features: set a reading challenge every year and only reach nearly half your goal,; want to store books you pass by on the internet (your favorite influencer shared and you can’t miss them) and quickly put them into your reading list,; easily take notes of the learning-worthy of each book and quickly put them into action.; know your reading speed and reading processwith the process bar and by tracking the amount of time you need to finish a book,; encourage youby automatic show you statistics of the number of books and pages you have read by month, quarter, year,; no more wondering what to read nextby planning with the tag system,; store all your books by category and genre, so you can easily take notes and find them again quickly.; 4 Databases are linked together: My Bookshelf, Genre, Reading Challenge, and Book Lists; 2 Page templates to help you update books by genre and category automatically
